meanings.definition: A type of fruit that grows on a thorny bush.
meanings.sent1: I picked some ripe blackberries from the bush.
meanings.sent2: Blackberries are delicious when added to yogurt.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the blackberries from my garden.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was the color of blackberries, deep and rich.
meanings.sent5: The blackberries gleamed in the sunlight, tempting all who passed by.

meanings.sent1: The artist used blackberries to paint the night sky.
meanings.sent2: Her hair had streaks of blackberries, adding a unique touch.
meanings.sent3: The storm clouds gathered, turning the sky blackberries.
meanings.sent4: The shadows in the forest were as dark as blackberries.
meanings.sent5: The velvet curtains were the exact shade of blackberries, elegant and regal.
